\subsection{Cone}
Consider arbitrary categories $C,D$ and a functor $F:C\to D$. A cone over the
diagram (functor) $F$ consists of an object $d\in D$ and a family of morphisms
$\big(d_c: d \to F(c)\big)_{c\in C}$ such that for each $(f:c\to c')\in C,\
(\forall c,c'\in C)$ the following commutes:
\parencite{awodey:category_theory}

% https://q.uiver.app/?q=WzAsMyxbMCwwLCJkIl0sWzAsMSwiRihjKSJdLFsxLDEsIkYoYycpIl0sWzAsMiwiZF97Yyd9Il0sWzAsMSwiZF9jIiwyXSxbMSwyLCJGKGYpIiwyXV0=
\[\begin{tikzcd}
	d \\
	{F(c)} & {F(c')}
	\arrow["{d_{c'}}", from=1-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow["{d_c}"', from=1-1, to=2-1]
	\arrow["{F(f)}"', from=2-1, to=2-2]
\end{tikzcd}\]

e.g.
% https://q.uiver.app/?
\[\begin{tikzcd}
	&& C & D & d \\
	a && b & {F(a)} && {F(b)} \\
	& c &&& {F(c)}
	\arrow[draw={rgb,255:red,92;green,92;blue,214}, curve={height=24pt}, dotted, from=2-1, to=2-4]
	\arrow[draw={rgb,255:red,92;green,92;blue,214}, curve={height=-24pt}, dotted, from=2-3, to=2-6]
	\arrow["{d_a}"', from=1-5, to=2-4]
	\arrow["{d_b}", from=1-5, to=2-6]
	\arrow["{d_c}"{pos=0.1}, from=1-5, to=3-5]
	\arrow["f", from=2-1, to=2-3]
	\arrow["h", from=2-3, to=3-2]
	\arrow["{F(g)}"', from=2-4, to=3-5]
	\arrow["{F(f)}", from=2-4, to=2-6]
	\arrow["F"{description}, draw={rgb,255:red,92;green,92;blue,214}, from=1-3, to=1-4]
	\arrow["g"', from=2-1, to=3-2]
	\arrow["{F(h)}", from=2-6, to=3-5]
	\arrow[draw={rgb,255:red,92;green,92;blue,214}, curve={height=24pt}, dotted, from=3-2, to=3-5]
\end{tikzcd}\]

\subsubsection*{As a natural transformation from the constant functor}
For categories $C,D$ and a functor $F:C\to D$ and the constant functor
$\Delta_d: C \to D$ for some $d\in D$, consider the natural transformation
$\alpha: \Delta_d \Rightarrow F$. For every $c\in C$, the corresponding
$c$-component $\alpha_c$ provides the family of morphisms of the cone, while the
naturality condition satisfies the necessary commuting diagram:

% https://q.uiver.app/?q=WzAsNCxbMCwwLCJkIl0sWzEsMCwiZCJdLFswLDEsIkYoYykiXSxbMSwxLCJGKGMnKSJdLFswLDEsIlxcbWF0aHJte2lkfV9kIl0sWzAsMiwiXFxhbHBoYV9jIiwyXSxbMSwzLCJcXGFscGhhX3tjJ30iXSxbMiwzLCJGKGYpIiwyXV0=
\[\begin{tikzcd}
	d & d \\
	{F(c)} & {F(c')}
	\arrow["{\id_d}", from=1-1, to=1-2]
	\arrow["{\alpha_c}"', from=1-1, to=2-1]
	\arrow["{\alpha_{c'}}", from=1-2, to=2-2]
	\arrow["{F(f)}"', from=2-1, to=2-2]
\end{tikzcd}
=
% https://q.uiver.app/?q=WzAsMyxbMCwwLCJkIl0sWzAsMSwiRihjKSJdLFsxLDEsIkYoYycpIl0sWzAsMiwiXFxhbHBoYV97Yyd9Il0sWzAsMSwiXFxhbHBoYV9jIiwyXSxbMSwyLCJGKGYpIiwyXV0=
\begin{tikzcd}
	d \\
	{F(c)} & {F(c')}
	\arrow["{\alpha_{c'}}", from=1-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow["{\alpha_c}"', from=1-1, to=2-1]
	\arrow["{F(f)}"', from=2-1, to=2-2]
\end{tikzcd}\]
